oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agricultural Innovation Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: B. Pound
G. Essegbey
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper sets out the general concepts and principles of the Agricultural Innovation Systems approach, and its application to agricultural research and development, particularly in sub-Saharan Africa
